entry.value: SELECT discipline, SUM(IF(latesubmits=0, 1, 0)) latecountasgn,%%00010%%00009COUNT(latesubmits) allcountasgn,%%00010%%00009ROUND(100*SUM(IF(latesubmits=0, 1, 0))/COUNT(latesubmits)) pctasgn%%00010FROM (%%00010 %%00010SELECT sj.name discipline, C.id courseid, IBIS.id asgnid, SR.Student_User_ID userid, %%00010%%00009SUM(IF(IBIS.timedue + IFNULL(IEDD.timeext, 0) < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(SR.Date_Modified), 1, 0)) latesubmits%%00010FROM cms.course C%%00010JOIN sl_course_settings cs %%00010%%00009ON cs.course_id = C.id%%00010%%00009AND cs.institution NOT IN (200,2362)%%00010JOIN content.subject sj ON sj.Key = cs.Subject_ID%%00010JOIN cms.ibis IBIS ON IBIS.course = C.id%%00010JOIN ibis.StudentAssignmentAttempt SAA %%00010%%00009ON SAA.Assignment_ID = IBIS.id%%00010%%00009AND Preview = 0%%00010JOIN ibis.StudentResponse SR ON SR.Assignment_Attempt_ID = %%00010%%00009%%00009SAA.Assignment_Attempt_ID%%00010JOIN ibis.Assignment A %%00010%%00009ON A.AssignmentID = IBIS.id%%00010JOIN cms.course_modules CM %%00010%%00009ON CM.instance = IBIS.id%%00010%%00009AND CM.module = 7%%00010LEFT JOIN cms.ibis_extended_due_dates IEDD%%00010%%00009ON IEDD.course_modules_id = CM.id%%00010%%00009AND IEDD.user_id = SR.Student_User_ID%%00010JOIN cms.grade_items GI %%00010%%00009ON GI.iteminstance = IBIS.id%%00010%%00009AND GI.itemmodule = 'ibis'%%00010JOIN cms.grade_grades GG %%00010%%00009ON GG.itemid = GI.id%%00010%%00009AND GG.userid = SR.Student_User_ID%%00010JOIN cms.user U ON U.id = SR.Student_User_ID%%00010 %%00010WHERE C.category IN (5,20)%%00010%%00009AND C.startdate >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP('2016-07-01')%%00010%%00009AND C.startdate < UNIX_TIMESTAMP('2017-01-01')%%00010%%00009AND GG.percentcomplete > 0%%00010%%00009AND IBIS.timedue > 0%%00010 %%00010GROUP BY sj.name, C.id, IBIS.id, SR.Student_User_ID%%00010ORDER BY sj.name, C.id, IBIS.id, SR.Student_User_ID%%00010) AS byuser%%00010 %%00010GROUP BY discipline%%00010ORDER BY discipline
